title: Office Parking Lot Maintenance Notice
content:
To all employees,

We would like to inform you that the office parking lot will undergo scheduled maintenance next weekend. The maintenance work will include repainting parking lines, repairing uneven pavement sections, and improving overall lighting in the area to enhance safety for all employees and visitors.

The parking lot will be closed from Saturday at 8:00 a.m. until Sunday at 6:00 p.m. During this time, employees are asked to use the temporary parking area located behind the East Building. Signs will be posted around the office to guide drivers to the correct location.

Please remember to move your vehicles from the main parking lot before 8:00 a.m. on Saturday. Any cars left in the lot after this time may need to be towed to avoid delaying the maintenance schedule.

If you have questions or require special accommodations, please contact the Facilities Team at facilities@workplace.com.

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

choices_text: In the temporary parking area behind the East Building
In the basement level of the main office building
